Author: Ael-GN
Text: Most of my sick clothes still fit me, with the exception of a few skirts that were already slightly too tight even at my lowest. I mean, I can zip them up but at what cost lol. I've actually gained muscles throughout my weight gain. I have more muscles than before I became sick. My body shape in itself hasn't changed much though, it's just more muscle-y and slightly more harmonious.

Author: livipup
Text: I can't really say because my anorexia started shortly after my transition, so I lost a lot of muscle in my legs, but when I got back to a healthy weight my size 0 skinny jeans still fit and my old jeggings were still loose, so I guess it happened to me. As I said though, muscle loss. Even still I seem to have quite muscular legs despite my weight loss, so I probably have less fat than normal for my weight and body shape. I'm sure that an average person at my weight and height with such small boobs might have bigger legs. Or maybe I just don't know what a woman of my height and weight should look like.
